verses.roman:
ghaṭe ghaṭe ṭheki' kata ghaṭa bhāṅgi' gela
śata śata ghaṭa loka tāhāṅ lañā āila

synonyms: ghaṭe ghaṭe ṭheki'-when there was a collision between one pot and another; kata—so many; ghaṭa—pots; bhāṅgi' gelā—became broken; śata śata—hundreds of; ghaṭa—pots; loka—people; tāhāṅ—there; lañā—bringing; āila—came.
translation: Many of the waterpots were broken when people collided with one another, and hundreds of men had to bring new waterpots to fill.
